name: Pixel Beer Fever
description:
My game for #LOWREZJAM 2016 :) .

It's a simple "Tapper" clone from arcade systems. You are a waiter, your task is to get a beer from a table and put it on proper beer "lane" for thirsty clients. If you break 3 beers or client reach you - you will get lost.

On the desktop if you want to use keyboard use left/right arrows for movement and spacebar for serving beers.

Have fun!

Game written in Java with libGDX framework.
